Description: Beautiful furnished Somerville top-floor condo w\ Amazing Deck + City Skyline Views. This pad is flooded with natural light and features high ceilings, a spacious living room, and bedroom with good closet space. Recessed lighting, central heat and air conditioning. Modern bathroom and kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances. Laundry in the basement. On-street permit parking. Best location, minutes to shops, restaurants, and public transportation.
